Just Cause of Korean People Supported in India
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported in India 
    Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The 15th congress of the All-India Forward Bloc held from Dec. 16 to 20 expressed full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause to defend socialism and achieve national reunification.
 Debabrata Biswas, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, addressing the mass rally timed to coincide with the opening of the congress, bitterly assailed the U.S. for blocking Korea's reunification and strongly demanded it withdraw its aggressor troops from south Korea.
 G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, stressed in his speech made at the special plenum on the theme of the "Down with Imperialism and Socialist Construction" held while the congress was under way that the bloc fully supported the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to defend socialism, especially the principled stand maintained by socialist Korea in its struggle against the U.S. nuclear row against it.    
 The resolution on solidarity with the DPRK adopted at the congress noted that the bloc expresses solidarity with the Korean people in all their efforts for national reunification as a party which signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad 
    Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Film shows, meetings, lectures and photo exhibitions were held by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement, "Geosvip" Co. Ltd., of Russia, the Indian Intellectuals Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexico-DPRK Friendship Association, Middle School No. 152 in Istapalapa district of Mexico City and in Cova County and the hospital of the Ministry of Defence of Guinea from Dec. 13 to 19 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
 The director of the political department of the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement, after watching the Korean film "The Korean People's Army, Steel-like Ranks", said that the KPA has grown to be an invincible revolutionary armed forces and won victory one after another as it has held in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, outstanding supreme commanders.
 After watching the Korean film "They Were Always Together on the Road to Bring about the People's Wellbeing", the general director of the Russian company said that the DPRK has drawn the world attention and always emerge victorious as Kim Jong Il has wisely led the KPA and the people.
 The chairman of the Indian Intellectuals Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in a speech at a meeting highly praised the greatness and outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, noting that holding him in high esteem as KPA supreme commander was the honor of the army and people of the DPRK and the world progressives.    
 The governor of Cova County of Guinea in a lecture noted that the Korean people have defended socialism and achieved shining successes in the building of a great prosperous powerful nation, pursuant to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
